sections.heading: limitations.(a) In this section:(1) Grantor trust means a trust as to which a settlor of a first trust is considered the owner under 26 U
sections.text: S.C. 671 to 677 or 26 U.S.C. 679, as such sections existed on November 14, 2020.(2) Internal Revenue Code means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.(3)
